name: @iherman/minicrypto
description: Set of functions that can be used to perform basic cryptographic functions hiding all the intricacies of WebCrypto.

tasks.docs: deno run -A tools/copy_readme.ts > minicrypto.ts; deno doc --html --name="Mini Crypto API" minicrypto.ts; /bin/rm minicrypto.ts
tasks.internal: deno doc --html --name="Mini Crypto Internals" --output="./devDocs" index.ts lib/*.ts
